page.title: 07VISITING THE FAIR
page.content: Half an hour later it was time for dinner.I had fish and chips and ice cream.Then my mum went up to the summer fair. Half an hour later my sister said to me"Are you going to the summer fair."I said I was so we both went to the fair.When we got there we had to wait for five minutes to go in. When I was inside I amiediatly went to look at the disco bouncy.After about five minutes we could go inside. It was brilliant I dived about every where. When I came out I walked about.I went to my mums store.She was on the book store and I had a few goes on some games and then I went home. When I got home I watched Grandstand. After it had finished I went train spotting.We saw a few trains but then we left west leak station.When I got home I had a sandwich and went to bed.
